opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
The judgment is affirmed on the opinion of President Judge Hook.

casebody.head_matter:
Hartley v. United Mine Workers of America, Appellant.
Argued March 15, 1955.
Before Stern, C. J., Stearns, Jones, Bell, Chidsey, Musmanno and Arnold, JJ.
Anthony Cavalcante, with him Ewing B. Pollock and Pollock & Pollock, for appellant.
John I. Hook, Jr., with him Scott & Hook, for appellees.
April 18, 1955:
